options.swapp:
apiVersion: core.oam.dev/v1alpha2
kind: ApplicationConfiguration
spec:
  parameterValues:
    - name: CLUSTER_ID
      value: master
    - name: NAMESPACE_ID
      value: sreworks
    - name: STAGE_ID
      value: prod
  components:
    - revisionName: RESOURCE_ADDON|system-env@env|1.0
      scopes:
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Cluster
            name: '{{ Global.CLUSTER_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Namespace
            name: '{{ Global.NAMESPACE_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Stage
            name: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}'
      parameterValues:
        - name: keys
          value:
            - DB_HOST
            - DB_PASSWORD
            - DB_PORT
            - DB_USER
            - APPMANAGER_ACCESS_ID
            - APPMANAGER_ACCESS_SECRET
            - APPMANAGER_CLIENT_ID
            - APPMANAGER_CLIENT_SECRET
          toFieldPaths:
            - spec.keys
      dataOutputs:
        - name: Global.DB_HOST
          fieldPath: '{{ spec.env.DB_HOST }}'
        - name: Global.DB_PASSWORD
          fieldPath: '{{ spec.env.DB_PASSWORD }}'
        - name: Global.DB_PORT
          fieldPath: '{{ spec.env.DB_PORT }}'
        - name: Global.DB_USER
          fieldPath: '{{ spec.env.DB_USER }}'
        - name: Global.APPMANAGER_USERNAME
          fieldPath: '{{ spec.env.APPMANAGER_ACCESS_ID }}'
        - name: Global.APPMANAGER_PASSWORD
          fieldPath: '{{ spec.env.APPMANAGER_ACCESS_SECRET }}'
        - name: Global.APPMANAGER_CLIENT_ID
          fieldPath: '{{ spec.env.APPMANAGER_CLIENT_ID }}'
        - name: Global.APPMANAGER_CLIENT_SECRET
          fieldPath: '{{ spec.env.APPMANAGER_CLIENT_SECRET }}'
    - dataInputs: []
      dataOutputs: []
      dependencies: []
      revisionName: INTERNAL_ADDON|productopsv2|_
      scopes:
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Cluster
            name: '{{ Global.CLUSTER_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Namespace
            name: '{{ Global.NAMESPACE_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Stage
            name: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}'
      parameterValues:
        - name: TARGET_ENDPOINT
          value: prod-flycore-paas-action
          toFieldPaths:
            - spec.targetEndpoint
        - name: STAGE_ID
          value: prod
          toFieldPaths:
            - spec.stageId
    - revisionName: K8S_MICROSERVICE|clustermanage|_
      scopes:
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Cluster
            name: '{{ Global.CLUSTER_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Namespace
            name: '{{ Global.NAMESPACE_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Stage
            name: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}'
      traits:
        - name: service.trait.abm.io
          runtime: post
          spec:
            ports:
              - protocol: TCP
                port: 80
                targetPort: 7001
        - name: gateway.trait.abm.io
          runtime: post
          spec:
            path: /sreworks/clustermanage/**
            servicePort: 80
            serviceName: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}-cluster-clustermanage'
      parameterValues:
        - name: REPLICAS
          value: 1
          toFieldPaths:
            - spec.replicas
        - name: Global.DB_NAME
          value: sreworks_meta
        - name: Global.APPMANAGER_ENDPOINT
          value: http://sreworks-appmanager
        - name: Global.AUTHPROXY_ENDPOINT
          value: http://prod-flycore-paas-authproxy
      dependencies:
        - component: RESOURCE_ADDON|system-env@env
options.name: 集群管理
